info.name: group_test_01
info.description: create 3 groups - All , odd, even with 8 fixtures and change intensity of them in an interweaved manner

exec: tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200;
postman.setGlobalVariable("UID_1", "192_168_1_100_1");
postman.setGlobalVariable("UID_2", "192_168_1_100_2");
